subject: how to use?
author: belowprices@yahoo.com
full_text:
Hi,
I did a search online for a Franks Box & was able to purchase something they said was basically the same. It's called a Soul Linx Ghost box (the back says radio shack).
I don't know how to communicate, all I get is plain old radio stations or static. Nothing else. I feel like I bought a radio & that's it. Idea's on what to do, please :(
Thanks,
Denise
